title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Leo: Building a Low Earth Orbit Satellite Network on AWS (AMZ302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Amazon Leo：在 AWS 上构建低地球轨道卫星网络 (AMZ302)
abstract: Join us as we explore the cutting-edge Amazon Leo (fka Project Kuiper) internet service, designed to deliver low-latency, high-bandwidth connectivity to customers worldwide. Amazon Leo has harnessed the power of AWS Regions and the global backbone, unlocking unique capabilities to meet the demanding telco and networking requirements of this ambitious project. In this session, we'll dive into the innovative Amazon Leo architecture, its seamless integration with AWS infrastructure, and the intricate details involved in building a truly global network – spanning both space and the ground. Discover how AWS empowers Amazon Leo to revolutionize global connectivity, bringing the world closer together.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，探索前沿的 Amazon Leo（前称 Project Kuiper）互联网服务，该服务旨在为全球客户提供低延迟、高带宽的连接。Amazon Leo 利用了 AWS 区域和全球骨干网的强大能力，释放独特功能以满足这一雄心勃勃项目的严苛电信和网络要求。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨创新的 Amazon Leo 架构、其与 AWS 基础设施的无缝集成，以及构建真正全球网络所涉及的复杂细节——跨越太空和地面。了解 AWS 如何赋能 Amazon Leo 革新全球连接，让世界更加紧密相连。
